info.name: Froebel
info.description: Froebel API Collection - Learning Platform with Quiz Management

request.description: Check if the application is running and healthy

item.name: Auth

request.description: Register a new user account. All users are assigned USER role by default.

query.description: Email verification token from console log or email

request.description: Verify email address using the token sent to user's email

query.description: Email address to resend verification to

request.description: Resend email verification token to the specified email
Login with email and password. Email must be verified first.
Request a password reset link to be sent to the email
Reset password using the token from forgot-password email

item.name: OAuth2

request.description: Initiates Google OAuth2 flow. Opens this URL in a browser - it will redirect to Google for authentication, then back to the frontend callback with tokens.
Initiates GitHub OAuth2 flow. Opens this URL in a browser - it will redirect to GitHub for authentication, then back to the frontend callback with tokens.
Initiates Microsoft OAuth2 flow. Opens this URL in a browser - it will redirect to Microsoft for authentication, then back to the frontend callback with tokens.

query.description: Authorization code from Google (provided by Google redirect)
State parameter for CSRF protection (generated by backend)

request.description: OAuth2 callback endpoint - called by Google after user authorization. Not called directly by frontend. Redirects to frontend with tokens in URL fragment.

query.description: Authorization code from GitHub (provided by GitHub redirect)
State parameter for CSRF protection (generated by backend)

request.description: OAuth2 callback endpoint - called by GitHub after user authorization. Not called directly by frontend. Redirects to frontend with tokens in URL fragment.

query.description: Authorization code from Microsoft (provided by Microsoft redirect)
State parameter for CSRF protection (generated by backend)

request.description: OAuth2 callback endpoint - called by Microsoft after user authorization. Not called directly by frontend. Redirects to frontend with tokens in URL fragment.

item.description: OAuth2 Social Sign-In endpoints for Google, GitHub, and Microsoft

exec: console.log('Tokens refreshed and saved to environment');

request.description: Exchange refresh token for new access and refresh tokens. Old refresh token is invalidated.
Logout and invalidate all refresh tokens for the current user
Get the currently authenticated user's profile
Change password while logged in. Requires current password. Invalidates all refresh tokens.

item.description: Authentication endpoints including local auth, OAuth2, and token management

request.description: Delete the currently authenticated user's account
Delete a user by ID (Admin only)

item.name: Profile

request.description: Get the authenticated user's full profile including stats, privacy settings, and all profile fields
Update profile fields. All fields are optional except displayName (2-50 chars required).
Update privacy settings. profilePublic controls profile visibility, showEmail controls email visibility on public profile, showStats controls stats visibility.

formdata.description: Image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF). Max 5MB.

request.description: Upload a new avatar image. Accepts JPEG, PNG, WebP, and GIF formats. Maximum file size is 5MB.
Remove the current avatar. Sets avatarUrl to null.
Get a user's public profile. Returns 404 if profilePublic is false. Email and stats visibility depend on user's privacy settings.

item.description: User profile management including profile updates, privacy settings, and avatar handling

item.name: Media

request.description: Retrieve uploaded media (e.g., avatar images) by ID. Returns the binary image data with appropriate Content-Type header.

item.description: Media endpoints for serving uploaded files

item.name: Quizzes

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Sample Quiz",
    "description": "A sample quiz for testing",
    "isPublic": true,
    "allowAnonymous": true,
    "timerMinutes": 30,
    "passingScore": 70,
    "shuffleQuestions": false,
    "showCorrectAnswers": true,
    "maxAttempts": 3,
    "tagNames": ["sample", "test"],
    "availableFrom": null,
    "availableUntil": null,
    "resultsVisibleFrom": null,
    "requireAccessCode": false,
    "accessCode": null,
    "filterIpAddresses": false,
    "allowedIpAddresses": null
}

request.description: Create a new quiz. Quiz is created as unpublished by default. Optional fields: availableFrom/availableUntil (ISO 8601 timestamps for scheduling), requireAccessCode/accessCode (access restriction), filterIpAddresses/allowedIpAddresses (IP filtering with CIDR support).
Get paginated list of quizzes created by the authenticated user
Get full quiz details including all questions

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Updated Quiz Title",
    "description": "Updated description",
    "timerMinutes": 45,
    "isPublic": true,
    "allowAnonymous": true,
    "passingScore": 70,
    "shuffleQuestions": false,
    "showCorrectAnswers": true,
    "maxAttempts": 3,
    "availableFrom": null,
    "availableUntil": null,
    "resultsVisibleFrom": null,
    "requireAccessCode": false,
    "accessCode": null,
    "filterIpAddresses": false,
    "allowedIpAddresses": null
}

request.description: Update quiz settings. Optional fields include scheduling (availableFrom/availableUntil), access restriction (requireAccessCode/accessCode), and IP filtering (filterIpAddresses/allowedIpAddresses with CIDR support).
Publish or unpublish a quiz. Set publish=false to unpublish.
Delete a quiz and all its questions
Add a new question to a quiz. Types: MULTIPLE_CHOICE, MULTIPLE_ANSWER, TRUE_FALSE, FILL_IN_BLANK, DROPDOWN, FREE_TEXT
Get all questions for a quiz
Update a question
Reorder questions in a quiz
Delete a question from a quiz

item.name: Import/Export

request.description: Import a quiz from JSON format (compatible with CanvasQuizReplay)
Export a quiz to JSON format

item.description: Import and export quizzes in JSON format

request.description: Get paginated list of published public quizzes
Get a quiz for taking (without correct answers)
Start a quiz attempt as an authenticated user. Include accessCode if the quiz requires one.
Start a quiz attempt anonymously. Include accessCode if the quiz requires one. Limited to 3 attempts per IP or email. IP filtering may block access from unauthorized addresses.
Submit answers for a quiz attempt. Returns results with scoring.
Get results for a completed quiz attempt

item.description: Quiz management, questions, import/export, and quiz taking

item.name: Courses

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Introduction to JavaScript",
    "description": "Learn JavaScript from scratch with hands-on examples",
    "difficulty": "BEGINNER",
    "estimatedHours": 20,
    "tagNames": ["javascript", "programming", "web"]
}

request.description: Create a new course. Course is created as unpublished by default.
Get paginated list of courses created by the authenticated user
Get full course details including materials and quizzes
Update course settings
Publish or unpublish a course. Set publish=false to unpublish.
Delete a course and all its materials

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Variables and Data Types",
    "contentType": "TEXT",
    "content": "# Variables

In JavaScript, you can declare variables using `var`, `let`, or `const`.

## Example

```javascript
let name = 'John';
const PI = 3.14159;
```

## Math Formula

The quadratic formula: $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}$",
    "durationMinutes": 20
}

request.description: Add a text material (supports Markdown and LaTeX)
Add a file-based material (reference to uploaded media)
Get all materials for a course
Get a specific material
Update a material
Reorder materials in a course
Publish or unpublish a material
Delete a material from a course

item.name: Quiz Association

request.description: Attach a quiz to a course
Detach a quiz from a course
Attach a quiz to a material
Detach a quiz from a material

item.description: Associate quizzes with courses and materials

request.description: Get paginated list of published public courses
Get public course details (without full content)
Filter public courses by difficulty level
Enroll in a published course
Unenroll from a course (deletes progress)
Get list of courses you're enrolled in
Get list of users enrolled in your course (owner only)
Get your progress in an enrolled course
Mark a material as completed
Mark a material as not completed

item.description: Course management, materials, enrollment, and progress tracking

item.name: Tags

request.description: Get all tags sorted alphabetically by name
Get a specific tag by its ID
Get a specific tag by its slug
Create a new tag (Admin only). Slug is auto-generated from name.
Update an existing tag (Admin only)
Delete a tag (Admin only)

item.description: Tag management - public read access, admin-only write access

item.name: Categories

request.description: Get hierarchical category tree with nested children
Get a specific category with its children
Get a specific category by its slug

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Programming",
    "description": "Programming and software development courses",
    "icon": "code",
    "sortOrder": 0,
    "color": "#3B82F6",
    "imageUrl": null,
    "isFeatured": true,
    "isActive": true
}

request.description: Create a new root category (Admin only). Slug is auto-generated from name.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Web Development",
    "description": "Frontend and backend web development",
    "parentId": "{{categoryId}}",
    "icon": "globe",
    "sortOrder": 0,
    "color": null,
    "imageUrl": null,
    "isFeatured": false,
    "isActive": true
}

request.description: Create a subcategory under an existing category (Admin only)
Update an existing category (Admin only)
Delete a category and its children (Admin only)

item.description: Category management - hierarchical category tree with public read access and admin-only write access
